experience.title: Sales Executive - Marketing and Sales
experience.description: Main Responsibilities (Pre-Sales) :Attend walk-ins at site office.Regular follow-ups. Industrial Outreach Communicate through email with new and existing clients about new phase launch.Attend incoming callsAttend exhibitionsContact Banks to approve project for home loans.Competitor Survey and research on new project launch.Co-ordinate with Channel Partner and BanksPrepare MIS sales, collections, Monthly and Quarterly sales review reports.  Main Responsibilities (Post Sales)Login application form in to SAP and send welcome kit to customer, which includes Welcome Letter, Allotment Letters, Payment schedule, Booking Receipt and Application Photo copy.  Raise invoices in to SAP and 30 days prior send invoices to customers.After receiving installment payment update in SAP and same forward to finance. Making out bound calls for outstanding dues.Send Gentle reminders, Reminder – I, Reminder – II, and Pre – Cancellation Letter to customer for payments. Provide information to customers about flat registration.Handling customer walk-ins queries related to product and services.     Prepare reports like MIS sales, collections, Registration lineup, Monthly and Quarterly sales review reports.Contact Banks to approve project for home loans.Attend inbound calls related to payments, Invoice, Receipt, Registration, Finance, Construction updates, Flat inspection and Possession queries. Provide training to new joiners for making sales order in SAP, Generate Payment Receipt, Reminder Letters, Cancellation Letter, Making daily Sales and Collection Report, Registration Process, and Loan Process.
